Package operations.arduino

Class Arduino

  • java.lang.Object
    • operations.arduino.Arduino
  • public class Arduino
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that interacts with Arduino microcontroller.
    Uses JSerialComm library to handle serial ports (linux only).
    Class is a singleton.
    Author:
    Piotr Duzniak

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Arduino getInstance()
        Return Instance of a singleton.

        There is only one Arduino object for program, only one COM port connected at all times

        Returns:
        Arduino object

      • setInstance

        public static void setInstance​(Arduino instance)
        Method that is used with XML data retrieval
        Parameters:
        instance -

      • open

        public void open()
        Opens USB COM port and waits 3 seconds to initialize.

        Port has to be closed with close() after using !

      • close

        public void close()
        Close serial port.

      • byteToInt

        public static int byteToInt​(byte[] array,
                            int start)
        Takes byte array and converts 4 consecutive bytes to int.

        Start point defines from which index start taking 4 bytes.

        Parameters:
        array - Byte array
        start - Start point
        Returns:
        int Number

      • delay

        public void delay​(int i)
        Delay calling thread by amount of ms
        Parameters:
        i -

      • clean

        public int clean()
        Clears serial port from remaining bytes
        Returns:
        returns amount of bytes that it cleared

      • write

        public void write​(int c,
                  int quantity)
        Take int number and write its bytes to serial port.

        Number of bytes written can be controlled.

        Parameters:
        c - int number
        quantity - number of bytes to write (starting from least significant)

      • read

        public byte[] read​(int quantity)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Read specified number of bytes from port.

        Method will wait for bytes arrival 1s.

        Parameters:
        quantity - How many bytes to read
        Returns:
        Bytes array or throws IOException if port doesn't have specified number of bytes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getComm

        public com.fazecast.jSerialComm.SerialPort getComm()
        Get SerialPort handle of connected Arduino.

        Searches for DEVICE_ID String in name of connected devices.

        Returns:
        SerialPort object or null if not found

      • setDeviceId

        public void setDeviceId​(java.lang.String Id)
        Set DEVICE_ID of connected microcontroller.

        DEVICE_ID has to be part of device's name, as reported in linux system.

        Parameters:
        Id -

      • getDeviceId

        public java.lang.String getDeviceId()
